QuestData.Title: A Hunt for Hawk Eggs
QuestData.Description: Before Alanna sends us on our grand hunt, there is something more immediate demanding our attention...$b$bI'm absolutely famished! No good man can hunt on an empty stomach.$b$bThere are hawks in the area, which means that there are also hawk eggs. I'm not sure how well they'll do in an omelet, but I'm always one for a culinary adventure!$b$bGood $c, could you bring back a few before we get started?
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you found enough eggs yet? You know what those small goblins say, time is money!
QuestData.RewardText: Fantastic! Here's hoping that hawk eggs aren't too gamey...
